item.description:
I am a PhD Candidate in the CHROMA team at Inria Grenoble. My current research interests include potential fields, Natural Vision, Markov models, self-organizing topological maps, pedestrian prediction in urban areas and decision making under uncertainity. I am being advised in my PhD by Anne Spalanzani and Dominique Vaufreydaz

I am currently on the lookout for new opportunities.

My CV can be found here

I will defend my thesis in September 2019.
